instruction: Edit the following paragraph to improve readability and clarity.
input: John newed up his car every morn and afta on most days of the week, altho he would sometimes forget on the odd day, but then he would make up for it the next day.
output: John usually washed his car every morning and afternoon on most days of the week, although he would sometimes forget on the occasional day, but then he would make up for it the next day.
